pkgndep 1.1.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

Get child dependency for a package

child_dependency.Rd

Get child dependency for a package

child_dependency(package, fields = NULL)

Arguments

package

Package name.
fields

Which fields in DESCRIPTION? Values should be in Depends, Imports, LinkingTo, Suggests and Enhances.

Details

The dependency information is based on packages retrieved from CRAN/Bioconductor on 2021-10-28.

Value

A data frame with child packages as well as its heaviness on its child packages.

Examples

# \dontrun{
child_dependency("ComplexHeatmap")

#>           parents                  children dep_fields heaviness

#> 2  ComplexHeatmap                  AMARETTO    Depends         5
